item.title: The Great Orchestra of Christmas Charity
item.description: The Great Orchestra of Christmas Charity is a very well known charity in Poland. It helps hospitals and patients by funding medical equipment. However they don’t do it like most other charities by asking for money on every ocasion. They make helping sick people accually fun. Once a year, they organize what they call a “GRAND FINALE”. During it they organise Concerts and other event’s. They make soup and flatbread for everyone that donates.
